thread.title: United’s Memphis Depay has third best selling kit in the world
thread.title_full: United’s Memphis Depay has third best selling kit in the world

author: paulmbanks
title: United’s Memphis Depay has third best selling kit in the world
text:
Tweet 
Memphis Depay’s Manchester United kit is the highest seller of any in England this season. Worldwide, he’s third behind Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi. 
This is according to a listing in Kit Bag, with a hat tip to FOX Sports @ The Buzzer, video below: 
As the video points out, Angel Di Maria was the #1 best seller in England last year. 
United gave both players the number that is associated with the best in club history. David Beckham. Cristiano Ronaldo. George Best. Eric Cantona. Bryan Robson. 
While it seems that many want to dress like Memphis Depay does on the pitch, few people (or at least few should) want to dress like he does off the pitch. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
